verses.verse: A good <S%H8034>name<s%> is rather to be <S%H977>chosen<s%> than <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%>, And <S%H2896>loving<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> rather than <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
The <S%H6223>rich<s%> and the <S%H7326>poor<s%> meet <S%H6298>together<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is the maker of them <S%H6213>all<s%>.
A <S%H6175>prudent<s%> man <S%H7200>seeth<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H5641>hideth<s%> <S%H6612>himself<s%>; But the simple pass <S%H5674>on<s%>, and suffer for <S%H6064>it<s%>.
The <S%H6118>reward<s%> of <S%H6038>humility<s%> and the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> Is <S%H6239>riches<s%>, and <S%H3519>honor<s%>, and <S%H2416>life<s%>.
Thorns <S%H6791><s%> and <S%H6341>snares<s%> are in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6141>perverse<s%>: He that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be far from <S%H7368>them<s%>.
Train <S%H2596>up<s%> a <S%H5288>child<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> he should <S%H6310>go<s%>, And even when he is <S%H2204>old<s%> he will not depart from <S%H5493>it<s%>.
The <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H4910>ruleth<s%> over the <S%H7326>poor<s%>; And the <S%H3867>borrower<s%> is <S%H5650>servant<s%> to the <S%H376>lender<s%>.
He that <S%H2232>soweth<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> shall <S%H7114>reap<s%> <S%H205>calamity<s%>; And the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5678>wrath<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail<s%>.
He that hath a <S%H2896>bountiful<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%>; For he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> of his <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H1800>poor<s%>.
Cast <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H3887>scoffer<s%>, and <S%H4066>contention<s%> will go <S%H3318>out<s%>; <S%H1779>Yea<s%>, strife and <S%H7036>ignominy<s%> will <S%H7673>cease<s%>.
He that <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H2890>pureness<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>, For the <S%H2580>grace<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> will be his <S%H7453>friend<s%>.
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> him that hath <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>; But he <S%H5557>overthroweth<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the treacherous <S%H898>man<s%>.
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%>, There is a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>: I shall be <S%H7523>slain<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> the <S%H7339>streets<s%>.
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of strange <S%H2114>women<s%> is a <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H7745>pit<s%>: He that is <S%H2194>abhorred<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall fall <S%H5307>therein<s%>.
Foolishness <S%H200><s%> is <S%H7194>bound<s%> up in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H5288>child<s%>; But the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H4148>correction<s%> shall drive it far from <S%H7368>him<s%>.
He that <S%H6231>oppresseth<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> to <S%H7235>increase<s%> his <S%H5414>gain<s%>, And he that giveth to the <S%H6223>rich<s%>, shall come only to <S%H4270>want<s%>.
Incline <S%H5186><s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%>, and <S%H241>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%>, And <S%H7896>apply<s%> thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> unto my <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
For it is a pleasant <S%H5273>thing<s%> if thou <S%H8104>keep<s%> them <S%H990>within<s%> <S%H3559>thee<s%>, If they be established <S%H3162>together<s%> upon thy <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
That thy <S%H4009>trust<s%> may be in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, I have made them <S%H3045>known<s%> to thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, even to thee.
Have not I <S%H3789>written<s%> unto <S%H8032>thee<s%> excellent <S%H7991>things<s%> Of <S%H4156>counsels<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>,

To make thee <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H7189>certainty<s%> of the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%>, That thou mayest <S%H7725>carry<s%> back <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> to them that send <S%H7971>thee<s%>?
Rob <S%H1497><s%> not the <S%H1800>poor<s%>, because he is <S%H1800>poor<s%>; Neither <S%H1792>oppress<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>:
For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H7378>plead<s%> their <S%H7379>cause<s%>, And <S%H6906>despoil<s%> of <S%H5315>life<s%> those that despoil <S%H6906>them<s%>.
Make no <S%H7462>friendship<s%> with a <S%H1167>man<s%> that is given to <S%H639>anger<s%>; And with a <S%H2534>wrathful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> thou shalt not <S%H935>go<s%>:
Lest thou <S%H502>learn<s%> this <S%H734>ways<s%>, And <S%H3947>get<s%> a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
Be thou not one of them that <S%H8628>strike<s%> <S%H3709>hands<s%>, Or of them that are <S%H6148>sureties<s%> for <S%H4859>debts<s%>.
If thou hast not wherewith to <S%H7999>pay<s%>, Why should he take <S%H3947>away<s%> thy bed from under <S%H4904>thee<s%>?
Remove <S%H5253><s%> not the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H1366>landmark<s%>, Which thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H6213>set<s%>.

Seest <S%H2372><s%> thou a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4106>diligent<s%> in his <S%H4399>business<s%>? he shall <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%>; He shall not <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> mean <S%H2823>men<s%>.
